answers.answer: Hello Dear,You need worry and relax as your weakness could be due to hypoglycaemia,which causes exteme exhaustion.Hypothyroidism coupled with diabetes leads to more weakness and tiredness.So need not be anxious and take your medicines regularly.Best

question: I would just like to be normal today I woke up tired and ate egg bacon and toast  took synthroid fo first  went to pick out pond material for the back yard and home depot  exhausted at home depot in about ten minutes so tired thought this is not normal blood sugar taken 86 became grumpy needed to get something fast face felt tingle upper  lip numb and nose like I drank alcohol got a sandwich and drank tea felt my self normalizing came home weak and slept most of afternoon. Exhausted when i went to grocery store for supper Items got steak and salad and bp bedtime now still tired but concerned laying around and still feeling tired and now im angry This feeling good for couple hours then tanking is like being on a roller coaster I think I am nuts my daughter in law thinks I could have gotten firal meningitus but not so nausea today I Still feeling tender where my stomach is and really dont have alot of appetite This is rediculous I would love to feel normal again and healthy I hate forgetting what I said yesterday Its like when I go to sleep I wake up in a new world age is hell I guess but I am just  54. please help need ideas Endocrinologist said synthroid is fine at 50 and maybe I should miss pill on Sunday. Confused
title: IM fat Im diabetic Im hypo thyroid I have a disc problem
